aboutProject.heading: Ebikwata ku Pulojekiti eno
aboutProject.paragraph1: Orbital Temple ye artwork era satellite egenderera okubeera yeekaalu erimu abantu bonna, ezimbiddwa nga tewali bbugwe asobola kutuuka. Pulojekiti eno eyatondebwawo omuyimbi Omubrazil Edson Pavoni, omuyimbi ali emabega w’ekijjukizo kya Inumeráveis ekyatuuka ku muntu 1 ku buli Bannabrazil 6 mu kiseera ky’ekirwadde kya COVID, eyita abantu okuva mu nsi yonna okuweereza erinnya ly’omuntu gwe baagala okujjukira. Amannya gano gasindikibwa ku setilayiti eri mu nkulungo, ne kikola ekijjukizo eky’omuggundu.
aboutProject.paragraph2: Nga bayita ku mukutu gwa yintaneeti ogusangibwa mu nnimi 136, abeetabye mu mpaka zino beenyigira mu kika ky’omukolo omupya. Yeekaalu y’Enkulungo (Orbital Temple) enoonyereza ku miramwa gy’okuyingiza abantu bonna, okujjukira, n’obuntu bwaffe bwe tugabana, nga ebuusabuusa lwaki tewali yeekaalu ya mubiri ku Nsi eyinza okwaniriza ddala buli muntu, era n’eteesa ku bwengula ng’ekifo kyokka okuyingiza abantu bonna mu ngeri ey’enjawulo we kuyinza okubaawo.

aboutArtist.heading: Ebikwata ku Muyimbi
aboutArtist.paragraph1: Edson Pavoni muyiiya wa Brazil era olugendo lwe lwatandikira mu nguudo z’omu kibuga São Paulo, embeera y’obwavu n’effujjo gye yakola emyaka gye egyasooka. Mu nsi Obukristaayo mwe bwali buwa ekkubo okuva ku nguudo, ebiragalalagala, n’effujjo, Pavoni yafuna obuddukiro mu kukkiriza, omulamwa oluvannyuma, bwe yafuuka omuvumirira okutulugunyizibwa kw’eddiini, gwe gwanditegeeza enkola ye ey’ekikugu.
aboutArtist.paragraph2: Mu 2020, mu kiseera ky’ekirwadde kya COVID-19, Pavoni yatonda Inumeráveis (etabalika) , omulimu gw’emikono ku nkulungo y’ebyemikono n’ebyamawulire. Pulojekiti eno yabuuzizza enkumi n’enkumi z’amaka era n’ewandiika emboozi z’abo abaafiirwa ssennyiga omukambwe, n’etondawo ekifo okujjukira we kwasukkulumye ku muwendo n’ebibalo. Ebitontome, ennyimba, ne symphonies byakolebwanga n’emboozi ezo. Empapula z’amawulire zaakola ebibikka nga bakozesa amannya n’ebyafaayo. Abayimbi bonna aba Brazil nga Fernanda Torres eyawangula engule ya Oscar, n’abayimbi nga Selton Melo, Eva Wilma, Camila Pitanga, Debora Secco, Tais Araujo ne Lazaro Ramos, n’abalala bangi nnyo basoma emboozi ezo ku ttivvi y’eggwanga. Pulojekiti eno yatuuka ku bantu obukadde 32, omu ku buli bantu bana abakulu okuva e Brazil. Kyafuuka omukutu gw’okuwonya, ekijjukizo eky’omuggundu eky’okujjukira.
aboutArtist.paragraph3: Oluvannyuma lw’emboozi ezisukka mu nkumi kkumi n’ennaku, enkola yavaayo: bwe twogera ku muntu afudde, tulonda ebitundutundu by’emboozi ye nga tulinga abawandiika ebbaluwa ey’okusemba eri omukuumi w’omulyango gw’ejjana. Tukola kyonna ekisoboka okubasindika mu kifo kye tukkiriza nti ggulu. Omulimu guno gwaleetawo okutegeera okupya: Enzikiriza zaffe ku ani agwanidde eggulu zikola butereevu ani gwe tukkiriza oba gwe tuggyako ku Nsi. Abafuzi b’amatwale Abapotugali mu Brazil baali bakkiriza nti Abaddugavu tebalina myoyo; enzikiriza eyo yawa obuddu obutuufu. Bw’oba wali enzaalwa, bw’oba wazaalibwa mu kifo ekikyamu oba ng’oyagala omuntu omukyamu, n’okutuusa kati, n’okutuusa kati, bategeezebwa nti enzigi z’eggulu zaali zikuggaddwa. Waliwo okwolesebwa kw’ebiseera eby’omu maaso okutajjula kugaanibwa?

team.heading: Ekibinja
team.content: Orbital Temple yatondebwawo nga bakolagana ne Sathi Roy, Pedro Kaled, João Pedro Polito, Victor Baptista, João Victor Alves, André Biagioni, VK, Jonathan Querubina, Guilherme Bullejos, Eduardo Dias, Roberta Savian Rosa, Clara Marques, Daphne Alves, Flavio Vidigal, Andre Holzmeister, Pedro Vidigal, Tatiane Putti, Rafael Fernandes, Bruna Cairo, Solid Concepts, RiseNY&Partners, IdeaSpace, n’abo bonna abagenda mu maaso n’okuteesa ku mannya ga yeekaalu eno.

pressCoverage.heading: Ebiragiddwa Mu / Ebiwandiiko by'amawulire
pressCoverage.paragraph1: Ebiwandiiko by’amawulire n’ebikozesebwa bijja kwongerwako nga bwe bigenda bibaawo. Okumanya ebipya, tuukirira ttiimu yaffe ey'amawulire.
pressCoverage.paragraph2: Emyoleso n’ebibaddewo emabegako mulimu okwanjula mu mpaka za Mercosul Bienal ez’omulundi ogwa 13, okusiimibwa okuva mu kirabo kya Lumen, n’okusunsulwa ekitongole kya Brazil ekikola ku kunoonyereza ku bwengula (INPE).
